Diagnostic.Message: BPWarningFormDesignOrControlsWithCustomPattern: 'FileLocationTabPage' is using the 'Custom' pattern. Please apply one of the other available patterns.
Diagnostic.Justification: The FileLocationTabPage tabpage contains three different Field groups instead of one. However, at runtime only one group of these three is going to be visible. If there was only one Field group at design time (as it is shown at runtime), this warning would not exist.

Diagnostic.Message: BPWarningFormDesignOrControlsWithCustomPattern: 'DetailsTabPage' is using the 'Custom' pattern. Please apply one of the other available patterns.
Diagnostic.Justification: DetailsTabPage contains a field group with three additional field groups where the first group contains a tree view, the second one a splitter and the third one a textbox that needs all remaining space to nicely show the longer message. This design is not supported by any allowed tab patterns on Simple Details w/Fast Tabs form pattern.

Diagnostic.Message: BPWarningFormDesignOrControlsWithCustomPattern: 'FormDesign' is using the 'Custom' pattern. Please apply one of the other available patterns.
Diagnostic.Justification: DocentricReportViewer is exactly the same form as SrsReportViewerForm, a system form for previewing reports. Its only purpose is to host a custom control that shows generated reports, and that is why no other pattern is applicable. SrsReportViewerForm uses also the Custom pattern.

Diagnostic.Message: BPWarningFormDesignOrControlsWithCustomPattern: 'RecipientsTabPage' is using the 'Custom' pattern. Please apply one of the other available patterns.
Diagnostic.Justification: RecipientsTabPage contains three field groups with one checkbox and a string control which Enabled property depends on the state of the checkbox. Only the Custom pattern allows to nicely show both objects inside the group in one line.

Diagnostic.Message: BPWarningFormDesignOrControlsWithCustomPattern: 'SenderTabPage' is using the 'Custom' pattern. Please apply one of the other available patterns.
Diagnostic.Justification: SenderTabPage contains four field groups with one checkbox and a string control which Enabled property depends on the state of the checkbox. Only the Custom pattern allows to nicely show both objects inside the group in one line.

Diagnostic.Message: BPWarningFormDesignOrControlsWithCustomPattern: 'ReadAndDeliveryReceiptsTabPage' is using the 'Custom' pattern. Please apply one of the other available patterns.
Diagnostic.Justification: ReadAndDeliveryReceiptsTabPage contains two field groups with one checkbox and a string control which Enabled property depends on the state of the checkbox. Only the Custom pattern allows to nicely show both objects inside the group in one line.

Diagnostic.Message: BPWarningFormDesignOrControlsWithCustomPattern: 'SubjectAndPriorityTabPage' is using the 'Custom' pattern. Please apply one of the other available patterns.

Diagnostic.Message: Group control 'ExpressionElementsGroup' only has group controls as its children.
